plays.text: Penalty to Fredrik Modin 2 minutes for High Sticking Joe Nieuwendyk
Goal scored by Chris Dingman assisted by Dan Boyle and Nolan Pratt
Penalty to Patrik Elias 2 minutes for Tripping Jassen Cullimore
Penalty to Joe Nieuwendyk 2 minutes for Holding Nikita Alexeev
Penalty to Turner Stevenson 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to John Madden 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Brad Lukowich
Penalty to Vincent Lecavalier 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Jamie Langenbrunner
Penalty to Tim Taylor 2 minutes for Roughing Brian Gionta
Goal scored by Brian Rafalski assisted by Scott Gomez and Scott Niedermayer
Goal scored by Martin St. Louis unassisted
Goal scored by Grant Marshall assisted by Scott Gomez and Scott Niedermayer
Goal scored by Jamie Langenbrunner assisted by John Madden and Brian Rafalski
